Producer: Louis G. Friedman, Stavros Merjos, Chris Moore, Adam Rosenfelt, Chad Snopek
Synopsis: When Stanley met Diana, he hadn't been on a date in years. She was easily the most appealing woman he'd ever seen. For months now, he's been writing down the perfect way to ask her out, and imagining the perfect date. Much to his surprise, when he finally has the nerve to ask her out, she says yes. When the big night finally comes, everything that can go wrong on a date, does -- thanks to an uninvited stranger. What starts out as an annoyance turns into something that surprises them all.
Title: The Third Wheel
